languages.text: {n}Планетарные трансляции не умолкали ни на минуту, живоописуя, как Веабос-6 станет погибелью бунтовщиков. Многие мятежники устрашились и, желая смягчить себе наказание, обратили оружие против врагов Вольного Торговца.{/n}

{n}Never pausing for a minute, planet-wide broadcasts described in vivid detail how Vheabos VI would prove to be a death trap for the rebels. That disheartened many of them, and they soon turned their weapons against the Rogue Trader's enemies in the hope of receiving a lighter punishment.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Планетарные трансляции не умолкали ни на минуту, живоописуя, как Веабос-6 станет погибелью бунтовщиков. Многие мятежники устрашились и, желая смягчить себе наказание, обратили оружие против врагов Вольного Торговца.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Never pausing for a minute, planet-wide broadcasts described in vivid detail how Vheabos VI would prove to be a death trap for the rebels. That disheartened many of them, and they turned their weapons against the Rogue Trader's enemies in the hope of receiving a lighter punishment.{/n}

{n}Never pausing for a minute, planet-wide broadcasts described in vivid detail how Vheabos VI would prove to be a death trap for the rebels. That disheartened many of them, and they soon turned their weapons against the Rogue Trader's enemies in the hope of receiving a lighter punishment.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die planetenweiten Übertragungen beschrieben unaufhörlich und detailreich, wie sich Vheabos-VI für die Rebellen als Todesfalle erweisen würde. Dies ließ viele von ihnen verzagen, und wenig später richteten sie ihre Waffen gegen die Feinde {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}, um ihre eigene Strafe zu mildern.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Never pausing for a minute, planet-wide broadcasts described in vivid detail how Vheabos VI would prove to be a death trap for the rebels. That disheartened many of them, and they soon turned their weapons against the Rogue Trader's enemies in the hope of receiving a lighter punishment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die planetenweiten Übertragungen beschrieben unaufhörlich und detailreich, wie sich Vheabos-VI für die Rebellen als Todesfalle erweisen würde. Dies ließ viele von ihnen verzagen, und wenig später richteten sie ihre Waffen gegen die Feinde {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}, um ihre eigene Strafe zu mildern.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bir dakika bile durmayan gezegen çapındaki yayınlar, Vheabos VI'nın isyancılar için nasıl bir ölüm tuzağı olacağını canlı ayrıntılarla anlattı. Bu, birçoğunun cesaretini kırdı. Kısa süre sonra daha hafif cezalar alma umuduyla silahlarını Hür Tacir'in düşmanlarına çevirdiler.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Never pausing for a minute, planet-wide broadcasts described in vivid detail how Vheabos VI would prove to be a death trap for the rebels. That disheartened many of them, and they soon turned their weapons against the Rogue Trader's enemies in the hope of receiving a lighter punishment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bir dakika bile durmayan gezegen çapındaki yayınlar, Vheabos VI'nın isyancılar için nasıl bir ölüm tuzağı olacağını canlı ayrıntılarla anlattı. Bu, birçoğunun cesaretini kırdı. Kısa süre sonra daha hafif cezalar alma umuduyla silahlarını Hür Tacir'in düşmanlarına çevirdiler.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Constantes transmisiones a escala planetaria describieron con todo lujo de detalle cómo Vheabos VI terminaría siendo una trampa mortal para los rebeldes. Aquello desalentó a muchos de ellos, que no tardaron en volverse contra los enemigos {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente con la esperanza de recibir un castigo menos severo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Never pausing for a minute, planet-wide broadcasts described in vivid detail how Vheabos VI would prove to be a death trap for the rebels. That disheartened many of them, and they soon turned their weapons against the Rogue Trader's enemies in the hope of receiving a lighter punishment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Constantes transmisiones a escala planetaria describieron con todo lujo de detalle cómo Vheabos VI terminaría siendo una trampa mortal para los rebeldes. Aquello desalentó a muchos de ellos, que no tardaron en volverse contra los enemigos {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente con la esperanza de recibir un castigo menos severo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}音阵讯息在整颗行星的范围内一刻不停地播放，宣传维博斯六号星会成为叛乱分子的死地。许多叛军士兵丧失了战意，很快将枪口对准了行商浪人的敌人，希望自己的悔改能减轻罪行。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Never pausing for a minute, planet-wide broadcasts described in vivid detail how Vheabos VI would prove to be a death trap for the rebels. That disheartened many of them, and they soon turned their weapons against the Rogue Trader's enemies in the hope of receiving a lighter punishment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}音阵讯息在整颗行星的范围内一刻不停地播放，宣传维博斯六号星会成为叛乱分子的死地。许多叛军士兵丧失了战意，很快将枪口对准了行商浪人的敌人，希望自己的悔改能减轻罪行。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Des transmissions-vox ont résonné sans interruption sur toute la planète, décrivant en détail à quel point Vhéabos-VI était un véritable piège mortel pour les rebelles. Cela a suffi pour décourager de nombreux individus au moral vacillant, qui ont retourné leurs armes contre les ennemis {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} en espérant ainsi écoper d'une peine allégée.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Never pausing for a minute, planet-wide broadcasts described in vivid detail how Vheabos VI would prove to be a death trap for the rebels. That disheartened many of them, and they soon turned their weapons against the Rogue Trader's enemies in the hope of receiving a lighter punishment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Des transmissions-vox ont résonné sans interruption sur toute la planète, décrivant en détail à quel point Vhéabos-VI était un véritable piège mortel pour les rebelles. Cela a suffi pour décourager de nombreux individus au moral vacillant, qui ont retourné leurs armes contre les ennemis {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} en espérant ainsi écoper d'une peine allégée.{/n}

languages.text: {n}休みなく惑星全域で流れた放送は、反乱どもがヴェアボスVIでどう死地に追い込まれるかを、やけに詳しく伝えた。そのせいで多くは気勢をそがれ、罰が軽くなると踏んで、すぐにローグ・トレーダーの敵に武器を向けた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Never pausing for a minute, planet-wide broadcasts described in vivid detail how Vheabos VI would prove to be a death trap for the rebels. That disheartened many of them, and they soon turned their weapons against the Rogue Trader's enemies in the hope of receiving a lighter punishment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}休みなく惑星全域で流れた放送は、反乱どもがヴェアボスVIでどう死地に追い込まれるかを、やけに詳しく伝えた。そのせいで多くは気勢をそがれ、罰が軽くなると踏んで、すぐにローグ・トレーダーの敵に武器を向けた。{/n}
